text: granthadavaralli kelavariddare – allahanalli nambike ullavaru mattu nimagenannu ilisi kodalagideyo adaralli (kur‌an‌nalli) hagu tamage ilisikodalagiruvudaralli nambike ullavaru. Avaru allahaneduru vinayasilaragiruttare. Avaru allahana vacanagalannu sanna belege maruvudilla. Anthavarigagi avara pratiphalavu avara odeyana (allahana) bali ide. Khanditavagiyu allahanu ksipravagi vicarane nadesuvavanagiddane
